dict.string: Multi Spells have 10% reduced cast time.
Multi spells cause their targets to deal 25% additional damage for 5 seconds.
Protective spells have a 15% chance to cause their target to become immune to all damage for 3 seconds.
Basic Spells leave behind an effect reducing damage taken of targets by 10.0% for 6 seconds.
Periodic spells cause their target to deal 25% more damage.
Empower spells grant you a blessing increasing all healing done by 10% for 10 seconds.
Multi-spells have a 10% chance to affect an extra two targets.
Protective Spells cause their targets to deal 20% additional damage while active.
Periodic spells have a 10% chance to apply their affect to an additional random ally.
Empower spells have a 10% chance to have their effects doubled.
Healing done is increased by 10% and spell costs are reduced by 10%.
If an ally would die instead you will instantly heal that ally for a small amount. This can not occur more than once every 30 seconds.
All healing done has a 1% chance to summon an Avatar that cast spells and heals allies by your side for 15 seconds.
